A general epistle to Friends by way of caution to take heed to the light, that they may be preserved from that lazy, idle spirit that veils the life. Keith, George, 1639?-1716.

s.l.], [Aberdeen? : 1671.
Signed: George Keith. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
